title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Robot- and IoT-based Mathematical Vocabulary Learning Design for Healthcare Tasks

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of mathematical terminology and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: The Ability to Explain Mathematical Problem-Solving Processes in English Using Robots and IoT Devices Is Enhanced
Language Barriers and Technical Operation Challenges in Technology-Integrated Learning Environments Are Resolved by Over 80%

Learners design a simulation model applying trigonometric functions and vector operations using IoT sensors (temperature/pressure sensors) and robotic interfaces (robotic arm control systems), achieving ≥85% accuracy through ≥3 iterative tests and submitting a report.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
